attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: with everyone moaning about congestion why not use some of the road tax money that is diverted away from roads to make public local transport free. this would ease congestion in major cities and cut pollution. Buses are always running anyway and usually are seen to be half full, this would fill buses. People heading into town to do their shopping would use the service rather then pay car park charges etc
